properties.name: Los Angeles
properties.message: Los Angeles, known for its Mediterranean climate, ethnic diversity, and the entertainment industry.

properties.name: San Diego
properties.message: San Diego is known for its beaches, parks, and warm climate.

properties.name: San Bernardino
properties.message: San Bernardino is part of the Inland Empire and is known for Route 66 and the San Bernardino Mountains.

properties.name: Ventura
properties.message: Ventura, officially named San Buenaventura, is known for its historic mission and scenic coastline.

properties.name: Palm Springs
properties.message: Palm Springs is famous for its hot springs, stylish hotels, golf courses, and spas.
